lines.speaker: Villain
text: HA-HA-HA!!! Welcome back to the self-righteous, all-important Hero.
So, you've conveniently decided that she doesn't matter anymore, have you? How easy that must've been for you.
You're the center of the universe, after all, and everything else is below you - even her.

lines.speaker: Hero
text: That's not what this is, and I think you know that.
I'm not a bad person for accepting that she's gone, and that it's not my fault.

lines.speaker: Villain
text: OHHH, NO NO NO. That's NOT how this works.
YOU don't tell ME what you are. I'M the one who tells YOU.

lines.speaker: Hero
text: You're scared of me, aren't you?

lines.speaker: Villain
text: HAH! SCARED!!! OF YOU!?! THE PATHETIC, WORTHLESS, UNLOVABLE WASTE OF SPACE!?!

lines.speaker: Hero
text: Those words don't hurt me anymore.

lines.speaker: Villain
text: THEN MY ARM WILL HAVE TO DO THE TALKING.
